rComments: I would take a class with her anytime. Expect two essays: One midterm 4-6 pages and final 6-8 pages. One presentation and participate in class to get an A, she has good discussions but people need to contribute more.  She's very approachable and helpful when you have questions.

Dascha is such an cool teacher! She's very dedicated to her students and what she's teaching. She is very helpful and the class isnt hard at all. You have to attend class and do the readings. I really recomend you taking her!
